aboutUs.feedback_thank_you: Your review will be added after moderator's approval.

visa_usa.title: USA Visa
visa_usa.description:
The USA is a federal state in North America. It ranks 4th in the world in terms of area and 3rd in terms of population. The USA is one of the leading countries in economics, politics, and mass culture.
  To travel to the USA, Ukrainian citizens need to obtain a visa. Unfortunately, it is currently impossible to pass an interview for an American visa in Ukraine. To schedule an interview, you can contact the US Embassy in other countries, such as Poland, Germany, Slovakia, Romania, Moldova. To assess your chances of obtaining a visa, order a free consultation.
  -How much I want to go back to New York!
  -Have you been there?
  -No, I wanted once and want again üòÅ
  To make sure this joke is not about you, order visa services from me :)

visa_canada.title: Canada Visa
visa_canada.description:
Canada is a huge northern country popular with both tourists and immigrants. It is not surprising, as the Canadian government has issued many laws aimed at attracting skilled professionals to the country, which has a positive impact on the local economy. Canada is home to national parks that are larger than some countries in the world.
  There are about 31,750 lakes in Canada with an area of over 3 km2.
  To travel to Canada, Ukrainian citizens need to obtain a temporary resident visa. The document submission process does not require an interview at the embassy. To assess your chances of obtaining a visa, order a free consultation.

visa_australia.title: Australia Visa
visa_australia.description:
Mysterious country where there are more kangaroos than people. Australia is the smallest and least populated continent on our planet with unique flora and fauna. Australia has countless things that can truly interest you.
  Australia is a country of 'opposites' Because Australia is located in the southern hemisphere, summer here lasts from December to February, and winter, respectively, from June to August. But that's not all. All stars, moon, and sun move in the opposite direction for us.
  To travel to Australia, Ukrainian citizens need to obtain a tourist, guest, or business visa. The document submission process does not require an interview at the embassy. To assess your chances of obtaining a visa, order a free consultation.

visa.visa_description: A visa is a special permit (document) that allows you to cross the border of a specific country. In other words, having a visa gives you the right to visit another country. A visa is usually issued with a valid passport. Many countries require a passport to be valid for at least 6 months and have one or two blank pages. Visa application documents are submitted at the embassy or consulate of the country you wish to enter.

document_list.id_copy: Copy of all pages of the internal passport and identification code.
document_list.job_certificate: For employees or students: certificate from the place of work, PE statement or certificate from the educational institution.
document_list.unemployed_certificate: For the unemployed: confirmation letter from the guarantor, copy of their internal passport, certificate from the place of work and/or bank statement of available funds. The guarantor can be a relative or a partner organization.
document_list.bank_certificate: Bank certificate of availability of funds: in the account or card (the amount may vary for each country).
document_list.application_form: Completed application form: each embassy has its own requirements and form
document_list.photos: Photos: the number and size are determined by the embassy of the country you are entering (the photo must be taken no later than six months before submitting the documents).

visa.additional_info: Depending on the type of visa, additional documents may be required. Each embassy or consulate has the right to request additional documents, as different countries have different visa regimes. The validity of visas may be limited by time or by the number of visits to the country. The necessary documents and their processing are individual in each case, and therefore the likelihood of refusal is quite high. The main reasons for refusal are errors in filling out the application form, as well as not knowing all the nuances when collecting documents to prove your ties to your home country. To avoid refusal, entrust us with submitting the documents for obtaining a visa to the country you need. Our experience combined with your determination will surely bring a successful result.

visa_usa.title: Visa to the USA
visa_usa.description: To visit the United States of America, Ukrainians need to obtain a visa. Documents for its issuance must be submitted no later than three months before the planned trip.
steps: Fill out the DS-160 form online! (also known as the nonimmigrant visa application)
Find the nearest embassy to you!
Receive your passport with the visa within 2-7 working days
visa_usa.documents_title: Documents for obtaining a visa to the USA
documents: ‚Ä¢ scan of the previous/second passport, if any;

visa_canada.title: Visa to Canada
visa_canada.description: To travel to Canada, you need to apply for a tourist, business, or guest visa (Temporary Visitor visa). For a Canadian visa, you need to submit documents online. Personal presence is required to submit biometric data at the visa center.
steps: Submit biometric data at the visa center
Leave your passport at the visa center for visa insertion
Receive your passport with the visa after review
costs:
Translation of documents 
 300 UAH per page/certificate
visa_canada.documents_title: Documents for obtaining a visa to Canada
documents: ‚Ä¢ Scan of bank statement and transactions for the last 6 months
‚Ä¢ Scan of property documents (apartment, car, land)

visa_australia.title: Visa to Australia
visa_australia.description:
To enter Australia, you need to apply for a standard tourist, business, or guest visa (subclass 600). Factors affecting the chances of getting a visa:
‚ÅÉ A job with good income, funds in accounts.
‚ÅÉ Travel history abroad, visas to the USA, Canada, the UK
‚ÅÉ Relatives or friends in Australia who have either citizenship or are well-off.
There are no special ‚Äúrefuge‚Äù programs in the country! But it is possible to apply for asylum in Australia once you are there.
steps: Fill out the visa application online
Receive the electronic visa via email
costs:
Additionally, licensed document translation 
 300 UAH per page
documents: ‚Ä¢ Scan of previous/second passport, if any
‚Ä¢ Bank statement and transactions for the last 6 months
‚Ä¢ Scan of property documents (apartment, car, land)
‚Ä¢ Documents confirming the purpose of the trip

translation.title: Translations
translation.subtitle: We offer professional translation in 30+ languages worldwide.
services: written translation of documents, certificates, contracts
written translation of personal documents, correspondence
simultaneous interpretation (multilingual support for your activities)

writtenTranslation.title: Written Translation
writtenTranslation.description: If you are looking for a reliable translator for documents, publications, or books ‚Äì you have found one )
writtenTranslation.details: Written translation is an accurate rendering in another language of the content of the foreign original. Both written and spoken texts are translated, but the result is always a paper or digital record.

certificationTypes.title: Types of Translation Certification
certificationTypes.agencySeal: Certification with the translation agency's seal is performed when there is no need for notarial certification. The agency's seal confirms the official registration of the translator or company to provide written translation services.
certificationTypes.notarySeal: Notary seal certification. Some translations require notarial certification. Notarial translation of a document is a translation with simultaneous certification of the authenticity of the translator's signature by a notary. The translator must be present during the notarial certification of the translation.

oralTranslation.title: Interpretation
oralTranslation.description: Overcoming language barriers in communication! We offer interpreters with experience in various formats and topics.
services: Consecutive interpretation at meetings and events
Accompaniment by a certified interpreter during notarial actions

voiceOver.title: Video Translation with Voice Over
voiceOver.description: The client provides the video in the original language, and we record the translation in audio format, synchronously with the speaker's speech tempo. Technical specialists overlay the audio translation on the video.

servicesPage.title: Additional Services
servicesPage.description: Among our additional services is the layout of documents for printing and electronic use.
items: layout and design of magazines, newspapers, brochures, catalogs, and any other promotional products
layout and design of translation for any technical and accompanying documentation
layout and design of books, scientific papers, encyclopedias, and reference literature
layout and design according to the original or layout from scratch, creating a unique design for your project
apostilleDescription: An Apostille is an official stamp placed in the country that issued the document to confirm its authenticity in another country. At first glance, the process of obtaining an apostille may seem simple, but in reality, it is complex and exhausting. Therefore, the best way to obtain an apostille on documents in Ukraine is to entrust the entire procedure to professionals.
An apostille is issued by the following state authorities of Ukraine:
‚Ä¢ Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Ukraine (MFA)
‚Ä¢ Ministry of Education and Science of Ukraine
‚Ä¢ The cost and timing of obtaining an apostille depend on the authority and type of document.
servicesPage.legalizationDescription: When submitting documents to institutions of foreign states, you may be required to have the documents undergo an official legalization procedure in Ukraine. The cost and duration of legalization at the consulate of the respective country depend on the type of documents and the country for which legalization is being carried out.
policeClearanceDescription: A police clearance certificate is an important document that confirms that an individual has not been convicted of any criminal offenses and is not under investigation at the time of receiving the certificate. If you are required to provide a police clearance certificate for employment, for submission to foreign state institutions, for obtaining citizenship, for processing documents, etc., our consultant will gladly assist you in obtaining the certificate from the Ministry of Internal Affairs of Ukraine without your personal presence.
Moreover, a police clearance certificate from Ukraine can be issued either urgently or in the standard procedure regardless of your place of registration, your location, or your citizenship.
To obtain a police clearance certificate from the Ministry of Internal Affairs of Ukraine, you need to send the relevant documents by email or Nova Poshta:
‚Ä¢ for Ukrainian citizens ‚Äì a copy of the valid passport (pages 1 and 2 + registration);
‚Ä¢ for foreigners ‚Äì a copy of the passport, full name in Ukrainian or a translation of the passport.
